summary.long: 1 Chronicles is a book of the Old Testament.

verses.text: Adam, Seth, Enosh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Cainan, Mahalalel, Jared,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Japheth were Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Gomer, Ashkenaz, and Diphath and Togarmah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also the sons of Javan, Elishah and Tarshishah, Kittim, and Dodanim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ham were Cush, and Mizraim, Put and Canaan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Cush, Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raama, and Sabtecha. Also the sons of Raama were Sheba and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Cush begat Nimrod, who began to be mighty in the earth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim and Anamim, Lehabim, and Naphtuhim:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Pathrusim also, and Casluhim, of whom came the Philistines, and Caphtorim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shem were Elam and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto Eber also were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg: for in his days was the earth divided, and his brother’s name was Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then Joktan begat Almodad and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth and Jerah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hadoram, and Uzal and Diklah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Abram, which is Abraham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Abraham were Isaac, and Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are their generations. The eldest son of Ishmael was Nebajoth, and Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jetur, Naphish and Kedemah: these are the sons of Ishmael.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Keturah Abraham’s concubine bare sons, Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah: and the sons of Jokshan, Sheba, and Dedan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Midian were Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch and Abida, and Eldaah: All these are the sons of Keturah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abraham begat Isaac: the sons of Isaac, Esau and Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Esau were Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz, Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuel, Nahath, Zerah, Shammah and Mizzah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Seir, Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Lotan, Hori, and Homam, and Timna Lotan’s sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shobal were Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon, Ajah and Anah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Anah was Dishon. And the sons of Dishon, Hamran, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Ezer were Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Jaakan. The sons of Dishan were Uz, and Aran.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were the Kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before a King reigned over the children of Israel, to wit, Bela the son of Beor, and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead, and the name of his city was Avith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Samlah died, and Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Saul was dead, Baal-Hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Baal-Hanan died, and Hadad reigned in his stead, and the name of his city was Pai, and his wife’s name Mehetabel the daughter of Matred the daughter of Mezahab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hadad died also, and there were dukes in Edom, duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram: these were the dukes of Edom.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are the sons of Israel, Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah, Er, and Onan, and Shelah. These three were born to him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanite: but Er the eldest son of Judah was evil in the sight of the Lord, and he slew him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Tamar his daughter-in-law bare him Perez, and Zerah: so all the sons of Judah were five.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Perez, Hezron, and Hamul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons also of Zerah were Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara, which were five in all.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Carmi, Achar that troubled Israel, transgressing in the thing excommunicate.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son also of Ethan, Azariah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hezron that were born unto him, Jerahmeel, and Ram and Chelubai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ram begat Amminadab, and Amminadab begat Nahshon prince of the children of Judah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Ishai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jesse begat his eldest son Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimea the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nethanel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ozem the sixth, and David the seventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whose sisters were Zeruiah and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah, Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether an Ishmaelite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat Jerioth of Azubah his wife, and her sons are these, Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezalel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And afterward came Hezron to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, and took her when he was threescore years old, and she bare him Segub.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Segub begat Jair, which had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Geshur with Aram took the towns of Jair from them, and Kenath and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these were the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after that Hezron was dead at Caleb Ephrathah, then Abijah Hezron’s wife bare him also Ashhur the father of Tekoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jerahmeel the eldest son of Hezron were Ram the eldest, then Bunah, and Oren and Ozem and Ahijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Jerahmeel had another wife named Atarah, which was the mother of Onam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ram the eldest son of Jerahmeel were Maaz, and Jamin and Eker.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada. And the sons of Shammai, Nadab and Abishur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the name of the wife of Abishur was called Abihail, and she bare him Ahban and Molid.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons also of Nadab were Seled and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Appaim was Ishi, and the son of Ishi, Sheshan, and the son of Sheshan, Ahlai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai were Jether and Jonathan: but Jether died without children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jonathan were Peleth and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant that was an Egyptian named Jarha.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife, and she bare him Attai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eleasah begat Sismai, and Sismai begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel, were Mesha his eldest son, which was the father of Ziph: and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hebron were Korah and Tappuah, and Rekem and Shema.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shema begat Raham the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son also of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth Zur.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ephah a concubine of Caleb bare Haran and Moza, and Gazez: Haran also begat Gazez.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Jahdai were Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Caleb’s concubine Maachah bare Sheber and Tirhanah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, and Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea. And Achsah was Caleb’s daughter.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur the eldest son of Ephrathah, Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Salma the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph the father of Beth Gader.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim had sons, and he was the overseer of half Manuhoth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of Kirjath Jearim were the Ithrites, and the Puthites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites: of them came the Zorathites, and the Eshtaolites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Salma of Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, the crowns of the house of Joab, and half the Manahethites and the Zorites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the families of the Scribes dwelling at Jabez, the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, the Suchathites, which are the Kenites, that came of Hammath the father of the house of Rechab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These also were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron: the eldest Amnon of Ahinoam, the Jezreelitess: the second Daniel of Abigail the Carmelitess:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The third Absalom the son of Maacah daughter of Talmai King of Geshur: the fourth Adonijah the son of Haggith:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The fifth Shephatiah of Abital, the sixth Ithream by Eglah his wife.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These six were born unto him in Hebron: and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned three and thirty years.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these four were born unto him in Jerusalem, Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine in number.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are all the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, whose son was Abijah, and Asa his son, and Jehoshaphat his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joram his son, and Ahaziah his son, and Joash his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Amaziah his son, and Azariah his son, and Jotham his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz his son, and Hezekiah his son, and Manasseh his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Amon his son, and Josiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Josiah, the eldest was Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, and the fourth Shallum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim were Jeconiah his son, and Zedekiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jeconiah, Assir and Shealtiel his son:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Malchiram also and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Pedaiah were Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel were Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, and Jushab-Hesed, five in number.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Hananiah were Pelatiah, and Jeshaiah, the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Shechaniah was Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah were Hattush and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Neariah were Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Elioenai were Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Judah were Perez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath, and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad: these are the families of the Zorathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were of the father of Etam, Jezreel, and Ishma and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Penuel was the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah: these are the sons of Hur the eldest son of Ephrathah, the father of Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Ashhur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah, and Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Naarah bare him Ahuzzam, and Hepher, and Temeni and Haahashtari: these were the sons of Naarah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Helah were Zereth, Zohar and Ethnan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Koz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Jabez was more honorable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him in sorrow.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, If thou wilt bless me in deed, and enlarge my coasts, and if thine hand be with me, and thou wilt cause me to be delivered from evil, that I be not hurt. And God granted the thing that he asked.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Chelub the brother of Shuhah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Eshton begat Beth-Rapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of the city of Ir-Nahash: these are the men of Rechah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Kenaz were Othniel, and Seraiah, and the son of Othniel, Hathath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Meonothai begat Ophrah. And Seraiah begat Joab the father of the valley of craftsmen: for they were craftsmen.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh were Iru, Elah, and Naam. And the son of Elah was Kenaz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jehallelel were Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asarel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ezrah were Jether and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon, and he begat Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Sochoh, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah: and these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh which Mered took.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham the father of Keilah were the Garmites, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shimon were Amnon and Rinnah, Ben-Hanan and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were Zoheth, and Ben-Zoheth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Shelah, the son of Judah were Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the households of them that wrought fine linen in the house of Ashbea.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba and Joash, and Saraph, which had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubi-Lehem. These also are ancient things.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were porters, and dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Simeon were Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Whose son was Shallum, and his son Mibsam, and his son Mishma.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Mishma, Hamuel was his son, Zacchur his son, and Shimei his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shimei had sixteen sons, and six daughters, but his brethren had not many children, neither was all their family like to the children of Judah in multitude.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they dwelt at Beersheba, and at Moladah, and at Hazar Shual,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And at Beth Marcaboth, and at Hazar Susim, at Beth Biri, and at Shaaraim: these were their cities unto the reign of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their towns were Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all their towns that were round about these cities unto Baal, these are their habitations and the declaration of their genealogy,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah the son of Amaziah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joel and Jehu the son of Joshibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were famous Princes in their families, and increased greatly their father’s houses.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they went to the entering in of Gedor, even unto the East side of the valley, to seek pasture for their sheep.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they found fat pasture and good, and a wide land both quiet and fruitful: for they of Ham had dwelt there before.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these described by name, came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the inhabitants that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their room, because there was pasture there for their sheep.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And besides these, five hundred men of the sons of Simeon went to mount Seir, and Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel the sons of Ishi were their captains.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they smote the rest of Amalek that had escaped, and they dwelt there unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons also of Reuben the eldest son of Israel (for he was the eldest, but had defiled his father’s bed, therefore his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel, so that the genealogy is not reckoned after his birthright.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For Judah prevailed above his brethren, and of him came the prince, but the birthright was Joseph’s)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuben the eldest son of Israel, were Hanoch and Pallu, Hezron and Carmi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Joel, Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, and Shimei his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Micah his son, Reaiah his son, and Baal his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beerah his son: whom Tiglath-Pileser king of Assyria carried away, he was a prince of the Reubenites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when his brethren in their families reckoned the genealogy of their generations, Jeiel and Zechariah were the chief,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, which dwelt in Aroer even unto Nebo and Baal Meon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also Eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Perath: for they had much cattle in the land of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in the days of Saul they warred with the Hagrites, which fell by their hands: and they dwelt in their tents in all the East parts of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the children of Gad dwelt over against them in the land of Bashan, unto Salcah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel was the chiefest, and Shapham the second, but Jaanai and Shaphat were in Bashan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren of the house of their fathers were Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia and Eber, seven.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are the children of Abihail, the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni was chief of the household of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in the towns thereof, and in all the suburbs of Sharon by their borders.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham King of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Reuben and of Gad, and of half the tribe of Manasseh of those that were valiant men, able to bear shield and sword, and to draw a bow exercised in war, were four and forty thousand, seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they made war with the Hagrites, with Jetur, and Naphish, and Nodab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they were helped against them, and the Hagrites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he heard them, because they trusted in him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they led away their cattle, even their camels fifty thousand, and two hundred and fifty thousand sheep, and two thousand asses, and of persons an hundred thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For many fell down wounded, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the children of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land, from Bashan unto Baal Hermon, and Senir, and unto mount Hermon: for they increased.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these were the heads of the households of their fathers, even Epher and Ishi, and Eliel and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, strong men, valiant and famous, heads of the households of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But they transgressed against the God of their fathers, and went a whoring after the gods of the people of the land, whom God had destroyed before them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tiglath-Pileser king of Assyria, and he carried them away: even the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, and brought them unto Halah and Habor, and Hara, and to the river Gozan, unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi were Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Kohath, Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the children of Amram, Aaron, and Moses and Miriam. And the sons of Aaron, Nadab, and Abihu, and Eleazar, and Ithamar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Johanan begat Azariah (it was he that was Priest in the house that Solomon built in Jerusalem.)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jehozadak departed when the Lord carried away into captivity Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Levi were Gershon, Kohath and Merari.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these be the names of the sons of Gershon, Libni, and Shimei.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Kohath were Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron and Uzziel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari, Mahli and Mushi: and these are the families of Levi concerning their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Gershon, Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeatherai his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Kohath, Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Elkanah, Amasai, and Ahimoth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, the sons of Elkanah, Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Samuel, the eldest Vasheni, then Abijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Merari were Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzzah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these be they whom David set for to sing in the house of the Lord, after that the Ark had rest.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they ministered before the Tabernacle, even the Tabernacle of the Congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the Lord in Jerusalem: then they continued in their office, according to their custom.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these ministered with their children: of the sons of Kohath, Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Samuel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his brother Asaph stood on his right hand: and Asaph was the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchijah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Jahath, the son of Gershon, the son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren the sons of Merari were on the left hand, even Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren the Levites were appointed unto all the service of the Tabernacle of the house of God,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Aaron and his sons burnt incense upon the altar of burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, for all that was to do in the most holy place, and to make an atonement for Israel according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are also the sons of Aaron, Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zadok his son, and Ahimaaz his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the dwelling places of them throughout their towns and coasts, even of the sons of Aaron for the family of the Kohathites, for the lot was theirs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah and the suburbs thereof round about it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But the field of the city, and the villages thereof they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah for refuge, even Hebron and Libnah with their suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa with their suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hilen with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ashan and her suburbs, and Beth Shemesh and her suburbs:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the tribe of Benjamin, Geba and her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs: all their cities were thirteen cities by their families.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And unto the sons of Kohath the remnant of the family of the tribe, even of the half tribe of the half of Manasseh, by lot ten cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And to the sons of Gershon according to their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the sons of Merari according to their families out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, by lot twelve cities.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Thus the children of Israel gave to the Levites cities with their suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which they called by their names.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they of the families of the sons of Kohath, had cities and their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they gave unto them cities of refuge, Shechem in mount Ephraim, and her suburbs, and Gezer and her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jokmeam also and her suburbs, and Beth Horon with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Aijalon and her suburbs, and Gath Rimmon and her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Aner and her suburbs, and Bileam and her suburbs, for the families of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the sons of Gershon out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan, and her suburbs, and Ashtaroth with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kedesh and her suburbs, Daberath and her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ramoth also and her suburbs, and Anem with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mashal and her suburbs, and Abdon and her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hukok and her suburbs, and Rehob and her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee and her suburbs, and Hammon and her suburbs, and Kirjathaim and her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun Rimmon and her suburbs, Tabor and her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, even on the Eastside of Jordan, out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Kedemoth with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And out of the tribe of Gad Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Heshbon with her suburbs, and Jazer with her suburbs.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Issachar were Tola and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Tola, Uzzi, and Rephaiah and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads in the households of their fathers. Of Tola were valiant men of war in their generations, whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand, and six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Uzzi was Izrahiah, and the sons of Izrahiah, Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, and Ishiah, five men all princes.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And with them in their generations after the household of their fathers were bands of men of war for battle six and thirty thousand: for they had many wives and children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of war, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Benjamin were Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Bela, Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri five heads of the households of their fathers, valiant men of war, and were reckoned by their genealogies, two and twenty thousand and thirty and four.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Becher, Zemirah, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abijah, and Anathoth, and Alemeth: all these were the sons of Becher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they were numbered by their genealogies according to their generations, and the chief of the houses of their fathers, valiant men of war, twenty thousand and two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jediael was Bilhan, and the sons of Bilhan, Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were the sons of Jediael, chief of the fathers, valiant men of war seventeen thousand and two hundred, marching in battle array to the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shuppim, and Huppim were the sons of Ir, but Hushim was the son of another.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Naphtali, Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum of the sons of Bilhah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The son of Manasseh was Asriel whom she bare unto him, but his concubine of Aram bare Machir the father of Gilead.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, and the name of their sister was Maachah. And the name of the second son was Zelophehad, and Zelophehad had had daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and called his name Peresh, and the name of his brother was Sheresh: and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Ulam was Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishhod, and Abiezer, and Mahlah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shemida were Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons also of Ephraim were Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and his son Eladah, and Tahath his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead: and the men of Gath that were born in the land, slew them, because they came down to take away their cattle.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare him a son, and he called his name Beriah, because affliction was in his house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his daughter was Sheerah, which built Beth Horon the nether, and the upper, and Uzzen Sheerah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Rephah was his son, and Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nun his son, Joshua his son.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their possessions and their habitations were Bethel, and the villages thereof, and Eastward Naaran, and Westward Gezer with the villages thereof, Shechem also and the villages thereof, unto Ayyah, and the villages thereof,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And by the places of the children of Manasseh, Beth Shean and her villages, Taanach and her villages, Megiddo and her villages, Dor and her villages. In those dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Asher were Imnah, and Ishvah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Beriah, Heber, and Malchiel, which is the father of Birzaith.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Japhlet were Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath: these were the children of Japhlet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Shemer, Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of his brother Helem were Zophah and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Zophah, Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Bezer and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Jithran, and Beera.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Jether, Jephunneh, and Pispah and Ara.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulla, Arah, and Haniel, and Rizia.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were the children of Asher, the heads of their father’s houses, noble men, valiant men of war and chief princes, and they were reckoned by their genealogies for war and for battle to the number of six and twenty thousand men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Benjamin also begat Bela his eldest son, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Bela were Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these were the chief fathers of those that inhabited Geba: and they were carried away captives to Manahath,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera, he carried them away captives: and he begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shaharaim begat certain in the country of Moab, after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He begat, I say, of Hodesh his wife, Jobab and Zibia, and Mesha and Malcam,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jeuz and Sachiah and Mirmah: these were his sons, and chief fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub and Elpaal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Elpaal were Eber, and Misham and Shemed (which built Ono and Lod, and the villages thereof.)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Beriah and Shema (which were the chief fathers among the inhabitants of Aijalon: they drave away the inhabitants of Gath.)
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishmerai, and Jizliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jakim also, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath the sons of Shimei,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishpan, and Eber, and Eliel,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Iphdeiah and Penuel the sons of Shashak,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the chief fathers according to their generations, even princes, which dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, and the name of his wife was Maacah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his eldest son was Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah: these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, even by their brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begat Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Micah were Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoaddah, and Jehoaddah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri, and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Moza begat Binea, whose son was Raphah, and his son Eleasah, and his son Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: all these were the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were Ulam his eldest son, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Ulam were valiant men of war which shot with the bow, and had many sons and nephews, an hundred and fifty: all these were of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Thus all Israel were numbered by their genealogies: and behold, they are written in the book of the Kings of Israel and of Judah, and they were carried away to Babel for their transgression.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the chief inhabitants that dwelt in their own possessions, and in their own cities, even Israel, the Priests, the Levites, and the Nethinim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uthai the son of Ammihud the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Perez, the son of Judah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Shiloni, Asaiah the eldest, and his sons.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Zerah, Jeuel, and their brethren six hundred and ninety.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the sons of Benjamin, Sallu, the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hassenuah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephatiah, the son of Reuel the son of Ibnijah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren according to their generations nine hundred, fifty and six: all these men were chief fathers in the households of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Priests, Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub the chief of the house of God,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren the chief of the households of their fathers, a thousand seven hundred and threescore valiant men, for the work of the service of the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Levites, Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Bakbakkar, Heresh and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the porters were Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For they were porters to this time by companies of the children of Levi unto the King’s gate Eastward.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Shallum the son of Kore the son of Ebiasaph the son of Korah, and his brethren the Korahites (of the house of their father) were over the work, and office to keep the gates of the Tabernacle: so their families were over the host of the Lord keeping the entry.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was their guide, and the Lord was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was the porter of the door of the Tabernacle of the Congregation.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these were chosen for porters of the gates, two hundred and twelve, which were numbered according to their genealogies by their towns. David established these, and Samuel the Seer in their perpetual office.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they and their children had the oversight of the gates of the house of the Lord, even of the house of the Tabernacle by wards.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The porters were in four quarters Eastward, Westward, Northward and Southward.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And their brethren, which were in their towns, came at seven days from time to time with them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For these four chief porters were in perpetual office, and were of the Levites, and had charge of the chambers, and of the treasures in the house of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they lay round about the house of God, because the charge was theirs, and they caused it to be opened every morning.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And certain of them had the rule of the ministering vessels: for they brought them in by tally, and brought them out by tally.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Some of them also were appointed over the instruments, and over all the vessels of the Sanctuary, and of the flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the incense, and the sweet odors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And certain of the sons of the Priests made ointments of sweet odors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah one of the Levites which was the eldest son of Shallum the Korahite, had the charge of the things that were made in the frying pan.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And other of their brethren the sons of Kohath had the oversight of the showbread to prepare it every Sabbath.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the singers, the chief fathers of the Levites, which dwelt in the chambers, and had none other charge: for they had to do in that business day and night.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the chief fathers of the Levites according to their generations, and the principal which dwelt at Jerusalem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, and the name of his wife was Maachah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And his eldest son was Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeam: they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, even by their brethren.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab and Esh-Baal.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begat Micah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of Micah were Pithon, and Melech and Tahrea.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ahaz begat Jarah, and Jarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri, and Zimri begat Moza.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Moza begat Binea, whose son was Rephaiah, and his son was Eleasah, and his son Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ismael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these are the sons of Azel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the Philistines fought against Israel, and the men of Israel fled before the Philistines, and fell down slain in mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines pursued after Saul and after his sons, and the Philistines smote Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchishua the sons of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the battle was sore against Saul, and the archers hit him, and he was wounded of the archers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then said Saul to his armor-bearer, Draw out thy sword, and thrust me through therewith, lest these uncircumcised come and mock at me: but his armor-bearer would not, for he was sore afraid: therefore Saul took the sword, and fell upon it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise upon the sword, and died.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died, and his three sons, and all his house, they died together.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when all the men of Israel that were in the valley, saw how they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, they forsook their cities and fled away, and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And on the morrow when the Philistines came to spoil them that were slain, they found Saul and his sons lying in mount Gilboa.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they had stripped him, they took his head and his armor, and sent them into the land of the Philistines round about, to publish it unto their idols, and to the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they laid up his armor in the house of their god, and set up his head in the house of Dagon.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When all they of Jabesh Gilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then they arose (all the valiant men) and took the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and brought them to Jabesh, and buried the bones of them under an oak in Jabesh, and fasted seven days.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Saul died for his transgression that he committed against the Lord, even against the word of the Lord which he kept not, and in that he sought and asked counsel of a familiar spirit,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And asked not of the Lord: therefore he slew him, and turned the kingdom unto David the son of Jesse.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then all Israel gathered themselves to David unto Hebron, saying, Behold, we are thy bones and thy flesh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And in time past, even when Saul was king, thou leddest Israel out and in: and the Lord thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be captain over my people Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So came all the Elders of Israel to the King to Hebron, and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the Lord. And they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the Lord, by the hand of Samuel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem: which is Jebus, where were the Jebusites, the inhabitants of the land.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come in hither. Nevertheless David took the tower of Zion, which is the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David said, Whosoever smiteth the Jebusites first, shall be the chief and captain. So Joab the son of Zeruiah went first up, and was captain.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David dwelt in the tower: therefore they called it the city of David.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he built the city on every side, from Millo even round about: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David prospered and grew: for the Lord of hosts was with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These also are the chief of the valiant men that were with David, and joined their force with him in his kingdom with all Israel, to make him king over Israel, according to the word of the Lord.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And this is the number of the valiant men whom David had, Jashobeam the son of Hachmoni, the chief among thirty: he lift up his spear against three hundred, whom he slew at one time.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And after him was Eleazar the son of Dodo the Ahohite, which was one of the three valiant men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle: and there was a parcel of ground full of barley, and the people fled before the Philistines.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they stood in the midst of the field, and saved it, and slew the Philistines: so the Lord gave a great victory.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And three of the thirty captains went to a rock to David, into the cave of Adullam. And the army of the Philistines camped in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when David was in the hold, the Philistines garrison was at Bethlehem.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David longed, and said, Oh, that one would give me to drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem that is at the gate.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then these three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it for an oblation to the Lord,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And said, Let not my God suffer me to do this: should I drink the blood of these men’s lives? for they have brought it with the jeopardy of their lives: therefore he would not drink it: these things did these three mighty men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three, and he lift up his spear against three hundred, and slew them, and had the name among the three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Among the three he was more honorable than the two, and he was their captain: but he attained not unto the first three.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada (the son of a valiant man) which had done many acts, and was of Kabzeel, he slew two strong men of Moab, he went down also and slew a Lion in the midst of a pit in time of snow.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, even five cubits long, and in the Egyptian’s hand was a spear like a weaver’s beam: and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian’s hand, and slew him with his own spear.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three worthies.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Behold, he was honorable among thirty, but he attained not unto the first three. And David made him of his counsel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These also were valiant men of war, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Anathothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Sibbechai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah of the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hurai of the rivers of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shageh the Harite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Hagri,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armor bearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother the Tizite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai and Joshaviah the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eliel and Obed, and Jaasiel the Mezobaite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These also are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he was yet kept close, because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the valiant and helpers of the battle.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They were weaponed with bows, and could use the right and the left hand with stones, and with arrows and with bows, and were of Saul’s brethren, even of Benjamin.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The chief were Ahiezer, and Joash the sons of Shemaah a Gibeathite, and Jeziel, and Pelet the sons of Azmaveth, Berachah and Jehu the Anathothite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ishmaiah the Gibeonite, a valiant man among thirty, and above the thirty, and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Jozabad the Gederathite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Elkanah, and Jisshiah, and Azarel, and Joezer, Jashobeam of Korah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Joelah, and Zebadiah the sons of Jeroham of Gedor,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the Gadites there separated themselves some unto David into the hold of the wilderness, valiant men of war, and men of arms, and apt for battle, which could handle spear and shield, and their faces were like the faces of lions, and were like the roes in the mountains in swiftness,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Ezer the chief, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Johanan the eight, Elzabad the ninth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These were the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least could resist an hundred, and the greatest a thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when he had filled over all his banks, and put to flight all them of the valley, toward the East and the West.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there came of the children of Benjamin, and Judah to the hold unto David,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if you come to betray me to mine adversaries, seeing there is no wickedness in mine hands, the God of our fathers behold it, and rebuke it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the spirit came upon Amasai, which was the chief of thirty, and he said, Thine are we, David, and with thee, O son of Jesse. Peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be unto thine helpers: for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the garrison.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Manasseh, some fell to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle, but they helped them not: for the Princes of the Philistines by advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul for our heads.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zillethai, heads of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they helped David against that band: for they were all valiant men, and were captains in the host.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For at that time day by day, there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the numbers of the captains that were armed to battle, and came to David to Hebron to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the Lord.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The children of Judah that bare shield and spear, were six thousand and eight hundred armed to the war.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the children of Simeon valiant men of war, seven thousand and an hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jehoiada was the chief of them of Aaron: and with him three thousand and seven hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zadok a young man very valiant, and of his father’s household came two and twenty captains.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the children of Benjamin the brethren of Saul three thousand: for a great part of them unto that time kept the ward of the house of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand, and eight hundred valiant men and famous men in the household of their fathers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were appointed by name to come and make David King.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the children of Issachar which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do: the heads of them were two hundred, and all their brethren were at their commandment.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of Zebulun that went out to battle, expert in war, and in all instruments of war, fifty thousand which could set the battle in array: they were not of a double heart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Naphtali thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear seven and thirty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Dan expert in battle, eight and twenty thousand and six hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of Asher that went out to the battle and were trained in the wars, forty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And of the other side of Jordan of the Reubenites, and of the Gadites, and of the half tribe of Manasseh with all instruments of war to fight with, an hundred and twenty thousand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: All these men of war that could lead an army, came with upright heart to Hebron to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest of Israel was of one accord to make David King.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Moreover, they that were near them until Issachar, and Zebulun, and Naphtali brought bread upon asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, even meat, flour, figs, and raisins, and wine and oil, and beeves and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David counseled with the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and with all the governors.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David said to all the Congregation of Israel, If it seem good to you, and that it proceedeth of the Lord our God, we will send to and fro unto our brethren, that are left in all the land of Israel (for with them are the Priests and the Levites in the cities and their suburbs) that they may assemble themselves unto us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And we will bring again the Ark of our God to us: for we sought not unto it in the days of Saul.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And all the Congregation answered, Let us do so: for the thing seemed good in the eyes of all the people.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David gathered all Israel together from Shihor in Egypt, even unto the entering of Hamath, to bring the Ark of God from Kirjath Jearim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David went up and all Israel to Baalah in Kirjath Jearim, that was in Judah, to bring up from thence the Ark of God the Lord that dwelleth between the Cherubims, where his Name is called on.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they carried the Ark of God in a new cart out of the house of Abinadab: and Uzza and Ahio guided the cart.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David and all Israel played before God with all their might, both with songs and with harps, and with viols, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they came unto the threshingfloor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the Ark, for the oxen did shake it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But the wrath of the Lord was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him, because he laid his hand upon the Ark: so he died there before God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David was angry, because the Lord had made a breach in Uzza, and he called the name of that place, Perez Uzza unto this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David feared God that day, saying, How shall I bring in to me the Ark of God?
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore David brought not the Ark to him into the city of David, but caused it to turn into the house of Obed-Edom the Gittite.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Ark of God remained in the house of Obed-Edom, even in his house three months: and the Lord blessed the house of Obed-Edom, and all that he had.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then sent Hiram the King of Tyre messengers to David, and Cedar trees, with masons and carpenters to build him an house.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore David knew that the Lord had confirmed him King over Israel, and that his kingdom was lift up on high, because of his people Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Also David took more wives at Jerusalem, and David begat more sons and daughters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And these are the names of the children which he had at Jerusalem, Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpelet,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphelet.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But when the Philistines heard that David was anointed King over Israel, all the Philistines came up to seek David. And when David heard, he went out against them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the Philistines came, and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David asked counsel at God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines, and wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the Lord said unto him, Go up: for I will deliver them into thine hand.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they came up to Baal Perazim, and David smote them there: and David said, God hath divided mine enemies with mine hand, as waters are divided: therefore they called the name of that place, Baal Perazim.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And there they had left their gods: and David said, Let them even be burnt with fire.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Again the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when David asked again counsel at God, God said to him, Thou shalt not go up after them, but turn away from them, that thou mayest come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when thou hearest the noise of one going in the tops of the mulberry trees, then go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee, to smite the host of the Philistines.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So David did as God had commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gezer.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the fame of David went out into all lands: and the Lord brought the fear of him upon all nations.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the Ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then David said, None ought to carry the Ark of God, but the Levites: for the Lord hath chosen them to bear the Ark of the Lord, and to minister unto him forever.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem to bring up the Ark of the Lord unto his place, which he had ordained for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David assembled the sons of Aaron, and the Levites.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Kohath, Uriel the chief, and his brethren six score.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Merari, Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Gershom, Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Elizaphan, Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Hebron, Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Of the sons of Uzziel, Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David called Zadok and Abiathar the Priests, and of the Levites, Uriel, Asaiah and Joel, Shemaiah and Eliel, and Amminadab.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And he said unto them, Ye are the chief fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, and your brethren, and bring up the Ark of the Lord God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For because ye were not there at the first, the Lord our God made a breach among us: for we sought him not after due order.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the Ark of the Lord God of Israel.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the sons of the Levites bare the Ark of God upon their shoulders with the bars as Moses had commanded, according to the word of the Lord,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And David spake to the chief of the Levites, that they should appoint certain of their brethren to sing with instruments of music, with viols and harps, and cymbals, that they might make a sound, and lift up their voice with joy.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel, and of his brethren Asaph the son of Berechiah, and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And with them their brethren in the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel the porters.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were singers to make a sound with cymbals of brass,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah with viols on Alamoth,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obed-Edom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps upon Sheminith Jenazzeah.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: But Chenaniah the chief of the Levites had the charge bearing the burden in the charge, for he was able to instruct.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Berechiah and Elkanah were porters for the Ark.
verses.speaker: Narrator
